en.description: Hi, I'm Trent, a data engineer who loves solving messy data problems and turning them into clean, usable systems. At Fifth Third Bank, Iâ€™ve helped modernize the our data technology by building cloud-based pipelines using tools like dbt, Snowflake, and Python. Before that, I worked as a full-stack developer inter, which taught me to think about both the data and the people using it.

Outside of work, I serve on the board of the Hook-A-Heart Foundation, where I lead all things tech to help grow our mission of creating inclusive events for adults and children with disabilities. I also build open-source tools like homescreen-hero, a full-stack Plex companion app with an active community. Whether I'm building something for a team, a business, or a cause, I'm all about making technology work smarter.
Thanks for stopping by! While this site is still a WIP, feel free to explore my projects, check out my experience, or just say hello!
